turns.ai_line: Good morning, doctor. I dey feel severe pain for my belle after I chop the leftover rice wey I keep for house. The area wey I dey so, na so so spoil food dey everywhere because of the humidity. I also dey feel like say I go vomit at any time and I dey stool water. This pain e dey worry me well well, I no fit do anything again.

Doctor, I bin dey try manage the pain since, but e no gree reduce. The pain e too much, e come dey make me dey sweat. I don drink plenty water make I fit dey hydrated, but e no dey help at all. You fit give me any medicine wey go make the pain reduce or any advice on waiting I fit do?

Doctor, I don forget mention say I don chop some leftover rice wey don dey for fridge since like three days ago. You think say e fit be the cause of the wahala? I bin think say e go still dey okay to chop. I don dey feel somehow for my belle and I dey purge since. I hope say no be something serious.
